程序包 callOfDuty

类 Tank

java.lang.Object
callOfDuty.Target
callOfDuty.Tank
public class Tank extends Target
represents the target: tank
作者:
Xinyang Shen

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    explode()
    Defines the behavior when a target is destroyed.
    String
    getTargetName()
    Returns name of the target, "Tank"
    boolean
    isDestroyed()
    returns true if every part of the target has been hit. false otherwise.
    String
    toString()
    Returns a single-character String to use in the Base's print method(which has been shot at) Returns 'X' if the target has been destroyed Returns 'O' if the target has not been destroyed Returns 'T' if the tank has not been destroyed Returns '-' is the target is ground

  • 方法详细资料

    • explode

      public void explode()
      从类复制的说明: Target
      Defines the behavior when a target is destroyed. Some may explode(armory, tank and oil drum), while some do nothing.
      指定者:
      explode 在类中 Target

    • getTargetName

      public String getTargetName()
      Returns name of the target, "Tank"
      指定者:
      getTargetName 在类中 Target
      返回:
      Returns the type of Target as a String.

    • isDestroyed

      public boolean isDestroyed()
      returns true if every part of the target has been hit. false otherwise. if it's tank it should shoot twice. (override method from the target class)
      覆盖:
      isDestroyed 在类中 Target
      返回:
      true if the tank is destroyed

    • toString

      public String toString()
      从类复制的说明: Target
      Returns a single-character String to use in the Base's print method(which has been shot at) Returns 'X' if the target has been destroyed Returns 'O' if the target has not been destroyed Returns 'T' if the tank has not been destroyed Returns '-' is the target is ground
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Target
